job.name: LcKppi
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} set Name = `basename ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}` # setenv NODEBUG yes # setenv STARFPE NO # setup 64b # starver TFG19g # starver TFG20j echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # set name = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else exit 1; endif set name = "" foreach name (K_S0Fixed Lambda0_barFixed Lambda0Fixed XiM_barFixed XiMFixed Omega_barFixed OmegaFixed \ AntiLNNFixed AntiH4LFixed AntiLNFixed \ AntiH3LFixed LNNFixed H4LFixed LNFixed H3LFixed \ H3LdpFixedFlat H4LtpFixedFlat H5LFixedFlat He4LFixedFlat He5L3FixedFlat He5LFixedFlat \ H3LdpFixed H4LtpFixed H5LFixed He4LFixed He5L3Fixed He5LFixed \ K_S0 Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega \ AntiLNN AntiH4L AntiLN AntiH3L LNN \ H4L LN H3L \ Upsilon1SmTsq Upsilon2SmTsq) echo $Name | grep $name if (! $?) break; # if ($name == $Name) break; end echo "name = $name"; if ($name == "") exit 1; # setenv StarEndMakerShell # set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,VFMinuitX,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; #Stx set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; #StiCA # set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,-McTpcAna,"${name}; #Stx (03/06/2020) # set chain = "MC.2019a,UseMCTstart,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; set sdt = ",sdt20190311" # set sdt = ",sdt20190610" # 3p85GeV_fixedTarget set VFMCE = ",VFMCE"; set Chain = ${chain}${VFMCE}${sdt}",Rung."${rung} set base = ${name}_${rung}_${f}_${N}; set file = ${base}.MuDst.root set tag = ${base}.tags.root set logFile = ${base}B.log echo "${file}" if (! -r PVxyz.root ) ln -s ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/../xyz.root PVxyz.root if ( ! -r ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${file}) then # if (! -r ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${base}.bla.root) then # touch ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${base}.bla.root # root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'","'${tag}'")' >& ${logFile} root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} # cp ${base}* ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # rm ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}/${base}.bla.root endif endif
